articles.author: Reed Alexander
articles.title: Jamie Dimon wants to hire bankers in hot sectors for the firm's new $1.5 trillion bet on America: 'Just give us a call' - Business Insider
articles.description: JPMorgan announced a new mega-plan to pump capital into sectors like AI, energy, and defense, which executives say will create new hiring needs.
articles.content:
Wanted: Star bankers and investment talent to steer JPMorgan Chase's new $1.5 trillion "resiliency" plan, which the firm announced Monday.
"If you think you're the right person, just give us a call,… [+3655 chars]
